com.polarion.platform.security

Class TcssToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polarion.platform.security.TcssToken

  • public final class TcssToken
extends java.lang.Object
    The factory used to create a Teamcenter Security Services (TCSS) token that can then be passed directly to the ISecurityService#login(String, String) method and used for token logins.
    Since:
    3.17.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TcssToken() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String create(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String token)
      Encodes the username and token to Base64 for use with the ISecurityService#login(String, String) method.
